sentence: at the same time, the range of expertise that the federal reserve develops in making monetary policy and in its engagement with the financial system allows us to bring unique insights and value-added to our supervisory activities.

this competitive distortion is not only unfair to smaller firms and damaging to competition today, but it also spurs further growth by the largest firms and more consolidation and concentration in the financial industry.
in addition to stricter regulation and supervision of large financial firms, the dodd-frank act places new checks on the growth by acquisition of our major financial firms.
